page.title: 03SEAWARD MARINE
page.content: At Seaward Marine Ltd.they make and fit out fibre glass boats. Fibre glass is really GRP or Glass Reinforced Plastic.They make dinghies cabin cruisers fishing boats and yachts.The firm began 5 years ago with 5 people and now{employs}17.The buoyancy of their boats is Lloyds 100 A1.(the highest) One mould makes about 250 boats which can be purchased complete,or hull only.To make the boats they buy a mould,cover it with matting,work in the resin and gelcoat and then it is polished.The biggest boat they have built has been 65 feet long.They fit out Aqua star boats and use Sabre engines in their boats they build.The boats are completed after sea trials,then they are { exported}under their own power,mostly to England.They hope to exhibit boats at Southhampton boat show 1985.
